caption.p: UV-Vis spectra of a poly-[NiAmben]-modified ITO-coated glass electrode in 0.05 M Et 4NBF 4/DCE in the potential range from −0.9 to 1.3 V: ( a) the spectrum of the polymer at −0.9 V (black curve 1) and the spectrum of [NiAmben] monomer (red curve 2); ( b) differential spectra, referenced to the spectrum of the polymer at −0.9 V.
